name: Coconut Cravings
description:
One day, at the beach, Lusaka and Cairo decided to eat coconuts fresh from big tree. Cairo can break the coconuts while Lusaka catches them. However, they must avoid rotten coconuts and durians or else they'll get bonked!

Controls:

Move the mouse left and right to move Lusaka, and Up and Down to move Cairo.

Click to move Cairo from one side to the other.
